profile.title: Profil ning Gumagamit
profile.mustLogin: Kailangan mung mag-sign in para akit deng settings.
profile.showOriginalWithTranslation: Ipakiteng orihinal at me-translate a mensahi
profile.showOriginalAndTranslation: Ipakiteng orihinal kayabe na ing salin
profile.noPrivateKey: Ala yang private key king device a iti para i-export.
profile.setBackupPassword: Magtakda password para i-encrypt ing backup:
profile.backupDownloaded: Midaunlad ne ing encrypted a backup.
profile.enterBackupPassword: Ilagay ya ing password king backup a ini:
profile.importSuccess: Meya-import ne ing private key king device a iti.
profile.importFailed: Mekasala ya ing import ning key (mali password o marupok a file).
profile.keysRotated: Mekagawa yang bayung key pair at me-upload ne ing public key.
profile.keyDisclaimer: Ali lulual ing private key mu king device. Mag-export kang kopyang may password para mag-restore king aliwang device.
profile.themeFreeNotice: Free ka pa — gamit neng malyaring Sun/Moon a opsyun king ibaba. Mag-upgrade para buklat deng aduang tema.
profile.backupDesc: Gumawa kang password-protected a backups ning keys, at i-restore la king aliwang device para mag-sync.
profile.privacyBlurOnUnfocus: I-blur nung ali naka-focus ing app
profile.notifyOnCopy: Abisuan na ku nung mekopya la deng mensahi ku
profile.loadFailed: Mekasala ya keng pamang-load ning profil
profile.followHint: Mikit la reng karelang istorya king Following mu nung mag-post la keng audience a Followers (o Public).
profile.sectionCrashedBody: Atin meging sali king sektsyung ini.
profile.callTextForwardingDescription: I-forward deng papasok a tawag at text king verified a telepunu mu o email. Ing makyalis a tawag/text atin yang Chatforia number mu.

chat.selectPrompt: Pumili text o chat room para mag-umpisa king pamag-chat

status.captionLabel: Nanu ing atsu king isip mu?
status.filesNote: Anggang 5 a file. 24h a pamayakap by default.

sidebar.loginPrompt: Mag-log in para i-edit deng settings.

premium.heading: Mag-Premium
premium.description: Buksan deng makapangyariang features at alisdan deng ads.

auth.headline: Seguru, global a mensahing atin instant a salin
auth.description: End-to-end encryption, AI-powered a salin, mawalang mensahi, at voice/video calling.
auth.desktopTip: Keng desktop ka? I-scan mu gamit ing telepunu mu para kuayan ing app.
auth.subhead: Pribadu, encrypted, at me-salin a pamanalita — agad-agad.
auth.tip: Malyari meng gamit ing Chatforia king ninuman a device — o idaunlad ya ing app para keng pekamasanting a eksperyensya.
auth.scanHint: I-scan para idaunlad ing app o buksan king browser mu.

press.title: Press
press.contact: Para king media inquiries, sulatan yami king press@chatforia.com.
press.contactText: Para king media inquiries, sulatan yami king press@chatforia.com.
press.boilerplateText: Ing Chatforia metung yang segurung messenger a atin instant a salin at E2E encryption, a me-design para gawang pribadu at madali deng pamanalita king yatu.
press.assetsText: Logo, screenshot, at larawan ning produk (mipalyari pasibayu).

careers.title: Trabaho
careers.intro: Maliit kami a team a gagawa segurung, global a messenger. Nung maniwala ka king encryption, accessibility, at malugod a UX, manyulat ka.
careers.openRoles: Buklat a puesto: Engineering (Full-stack, iOS, Android), Produk, Suporta.
careers.apply: Nukumaga mag-apply: I-email me ing resume/links mu king jobs@chatforia.com.

about.title: Tungkul king Chatforia
about.description: Ing Chatforia metung yang segurung, multi-lingual a messenger a atin end-to-end encryption, instant a salin, at voice/video calling. Ing misyun mi simple mu: pakisabian deng tau—saupan, pribadu, at atyu ketang ali-aliwang amanu.

values.control: Kontrol: Opsyunal deng mawalang mensahi at read receipts.

about.howDescription: Ding mensahi me-encrypt la king device mu bayu la lumual. Ing salin, backups, at device sync me-design da para malati mu ing makit ming data.

advertise.title: Mag-anunsyu kayabe ing Chatforia
advertise.description: Abutan deng aktibong gagamit ning mensahing app gamit deng maayos at brand-safe a puwesta. Atin kaming banner king makikitang lugar, sponsorships, at house promos. Ali akit deng ads deng Premium.

adsense.withPubId: Gagamit kami ngeni king Google AdSense. Nung buri meng targetan king Google Ads, gamit neng publisher ID {{pubId}} at sabyan yung managad managed placement kareng unit king baba. Atin direct sponsorships — gamit neng porma.
adsense.noPubId: Gagamit kami ngeni king Google AdSense. Atin mu rin direct sponsorships — gamit neng porma king baba.

advertise.noPlacements: Ala pang me-configure a puwesta. Idagdag la king ads/placements.js.

why.highSession: Maraas a dalas at pamanantili king chat UI
why.brandSafe: Brand-safe a pormat; maayos a frequency capping
why.sponsoredMoments: Atin sponsored moments (e.g., “Start a Chat” modal)
why.deals: Direct deals o programmatic king AdSense/Google Ads

form.submittedMsg: Dakal a salamat! Mipadala ne ing pamanusulat yu. Sumubli kami payuli.
form.missingRequired: Pakipunan la ing lagyu, email, at mensahi.
form.successToast: Dakal a salamat! Mipabalik kami kapilan man.
form.mailtoInfo: Bubuksan ne ing email client mu para mipadala ing pamanusulat…
form.messageLabel: Sabian mu ing tungkul king kampanya
form.messagePlaceholder: Target, petsa, KPI, pabor a puwesta…

legal.disclaimerStart: Kapamilatan ning pamag-submit, sumasang-ayon ka king

upgrade.title: Mag-Upgrade
upgrade.subtitle: Pili ing ustung plano: alisdan deng ads keng Plus, o kuanan deng ganap a features keng Premium.

gettingStarted.title: Pangumpisa
gettingStarted.subtitle: Bayu ka king Chatforia? Ing malating gabay a ini misasabyan deng dapat mu para magamit keng pira mung minute.

alert.text: Lumawak ya ing gabay a ini kabang milunsad deng bayung features. Nung atin kulang, manyulat ka king

section1.title: 1) Gumawa kang account
section1.loginText: gamit ing atyu mu nang account.

section2.title: 2) Magsimula king pamanalita
section2.item1: Gumawa kang DM o Group at ipadala ing mumunang mensahi mu.
section2.item2: Gamit neng instant a salin para makipag-chat king 100+ amanu.
section2.item3: SUSI: Subukan deng mawalang mensahi at read receipts king Profile → Privacy.

section3.title: 3) Lumub ya pa
section3.item1Part2: a page (Plus = alis ads, Premium = ganap a features).
section3.item2Part1: I-link deng aduang device at i-setup deng encrypted backups king

account.q: Nanu ing pamag-gawa o pamanguli account?
account.a: I-download ing app o gamit neng web, tap “Gumawa account”, i-verify ing email/telepunu mu. Para bawi, gamit neng “Mekalimu password”.

privacy.a: Wa. Ding mensahi at tawag E2E encrypted la by default. Ika mu at ing tumanggap ing makabasa.

translate.q: Nanu ing pamangobra ning instant a salin?
translate.a: I-enable ing “Auto-translate” king Settings → Appearance & Language. Manalakad ya on-device nung atsu, aliwa naman king segurung API a atin malating metadata.

contact.a: Sulatan yamu kami king support@chatforia.com. Isali mo rin screenshot at bersyun ning app mu.

contact.title: Kontakan mi
contact.successMsg: Dakal a salamat—mipabalik kami king email.

intro.body: Ing Privacy Policy a ini misasabyan nanu ing kolekta, gamit, at pamye-sali ning Chatforia (“mi”, “kami”) nung gamit me deng app at serbisyo mi. Me-design ya ing Chatforia para malati mu ing data a ating kakit mi.

infoWeCollect.title: Ing kolektang impormasyun
infoWeCollect.account: Impormasyun king Account (e.g., email/telepunu) para gawang at segpawan ing account mu.
infoWeCollect.encrypted: Encrypted a contenuto (mensahi/tawag) E2E encrypted la; e mi la mabasa.
infoWeCollect.diagnostics: Diagnostic/usage anti mo ring crash logs, device type, o malating analytics para pa-yamyaman ing performance.

howWeUse.title: Nanu ing gamit mi king impormasyun
howWeUse.provide: Ibigay at segpawan ing serbisyo (auth, spam/abuse detection).
howWeUse.improve: Pa-yamyaman deng features (kalidad ning salin, kasalpantayanan).

sharing.title: Pamye-sali
sharing.body: Ali mi benta personal a data. Maliari kaming manyali malating data kareng processors (e.g., push notifications, analytics) king masikap a kontrata.

rights.title: Deng karapatan mu
rights.body: Agpang king lugar mu (e.g., GDPR/UK GDPR/CPRA), malyari kang mangayaka access, koreksyun, pamurul, o opt-out kareng pekadakalan a pamamagamit. Kontak: privacy@chatforia.com.

retention.title: Pamayakup data & seguridad
retention.body: Tinatagalan mi mu ing makasaup keng pamag-obra ning serbisyo at gagamit kaming industria-standard a seguridad. E2E a contenuto e mi ya malyaring i-decrypt.

children.title: Anak
children.body: Ali ya para kareng anak a lullub keng 13 (o agpang king lokal a ligal a edad) ing Chatforia.

changes.title: Pamye-bayu
changes.body: I-post mi reng bayung pamye-bayu keni at baywan mi ing “Pekabayung panaun”.

intro.body: Kapamilatan ning pamaggamit mu king Chatforia, sumasang-ayon ka kareng Terms a ini. Nung e ka sang-ayon, ali mu gamit ing serbisyo.

accounts.title: Accounts
accounts.itemAccurateInfo: Magbigay tumpak a impormasyun at salese deng kredensyal mu.
accounts.itemResponsibility: Aka-salese ka king gaganap king account mu.

acceptableUse.title: Katanggap-tanggap a gamit
acceptableUse.itemNoAbuse: Ali marapat ing ilegal, abusadu, o meka-lako a contenuto; ali rin spam o automated a pangaabuso.
acceptableUse.itemSuspend: Malyari ming i-suspend/terminate nung atin sali.

yourContent.title: Ing contenuto mu
yourContent.body: Ika pa rin ing atin karapatan king contenuto mu. Minye ka mu karapatan a kailangan para pamanalakad ning serbisyo (e.g., routing, imbakan, salin).

disclaimer.title: Disclaimer & responsabilidad
disclaimer.body: Ibigay ya ing Serbisyo “as is” alang warranty. Hangganing a makayan mi ligal, ali ya manibat ing Chatforia kareng indirect o consequential a kasala.

changes.title: Pamye-bayu
changes.body: Malyari ming i-update deng terms; ing tuluy mu pang gamit kaybat ning bayu a terms ay kayabe ya king kayang pamangayon.

doNotSell.title: Ali Benta o I-Share Ing Personal Kung Impormasyun
doNotSell.body: E mibenta ning Chatforia ing personal a impormasyun. Atin pa mu ring karapatan deng California residents agpang CPRA para mag-submit request gamit ing button king baba.

cookies.title: Cookie Settings
cookies.body: Maggamit ing Chatforia malating cookies mu (e.g., session, seguridad). Ali kami gagamit third-party ads cookies. I-manage deng cookies king settings ning browser mu.
